page.title: 12DERBY DAY - THE CROWDS
page.content:
{... "Most people were dressed nicely {and they arrived on trains which were {crowded,other people were very scruffy {and were having barbecues or picnics."
... "Some people came in groups and were drinking things like beer,wine and scotch."
{... "Some of the people were drunk, {like one man I saw who had a chef's {hat on and a monkey wrapped around his {head,with a glass of champagne in his {hand."
... "Crowds of people pushing and shoving looking like tiny ants,the fair in full swing,people screaming, book-makers shouting their odds, children with toffee apples and candy floss."
